VINTAGE 1950'S DOG N SUD'S DRIVE-IN'S CAR HOP TRAY For Sale
This item has been shown 221 times.
VINTAGE 1950'S DOG N SUD'S DRIVE-IN'S CAR HOP TRAY : $45
peterson42760 store
This is Vintage Dog-n- suds Drive-In car hop tray and- ( authentic 1950's attendant return tray card ) This will make a neat accessory for a carwindow at a show, or just as a piece ofcollectible .This shows signs of use but it isstill in very nice condition. ( SEE THE PICTURE ) The tray and attendant card is only for sale , NO FAKE DISPLAY FOOD COME WITH TRAY, The tray come with original red-green rubber covered leg's hook's . Good luck Thank-you for offering
1. THIS IS A PAY-PAL sale ONLY!!!
SHIPMENT TO THE UNITED STATES ONLY( Due to restrictions in other countries, I will only ship to U.S.).
